knimeNode.name: Global Thresholder (deprecated)
knimeNode.shortDescription: A threshold is determined manually or calculated automatically to threshold the image.

fullDescription.intro: A thresholder thresholds the intensity values of an image according to a given threshold. The result is a binary segmentation. Please note that you have to use the Connected Component Analysis Node after the thresholding analysis to extract a segmentation with seperated segments. For details see: "Survey over image thresholding techniques and quantitative performance evaluation" Sezgin04.
